name: Beer Batter Coconut Shrimp
author: Amanda Chavez
summary: Crunchy sweet coconut coated shrimp is fast and delicious! Use sweet and sour sauce for dipping, if desired.
ingredients: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Beat flour, beer, egg, and salt in a bowl with an electric mixer on low until batter is smooth
Spread coconut flakes in a shallow dish
Dip shrimp into beer batter, shaking off excess, then press into coconut
Place shrimp onto a plate while breading the rest; do not stack
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat until hot but not smoking, 3 to 4 minutes
Fry about a third of the shrimp in the hot oil until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes
Allow shrimp to drain on a wire rack set over paper towels
